Message:
Those words entice me as
I wait for death to claim me.

But are they figments
of my imagination...
or the devil’s temptation?
I do not care which it is.

I mustered every remaining
ounce of strength left in me
and gave my answer.

“If it is for Queen Amleth,
I do not give a damn
what happens to me!

If I must sacrifice my life
for her, I would without
even a second thought!”

I shall not allow anyone...
to take you away from me!

...In that instant,
a sinister red aura envelops me.

An indomitable power begins
to subjugate my body...
